price: 81. Waxayse yidhaahdeen wax la mid ah waxay dadkii hore yidhaahdeen.
arabic: بَلۡ قَالُواْ مِثۡلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bal qālū mith'la mā qāla al-awalūna
